diff_analysis.evidence: In the old code, the i18n helper in decidim-core/app/cells/decidim/version_cell.rb returned translated strings directly via t(...) without HTML escaping. The new patch wraps this in decidim_html_escape(...), indicating that previously, attacker-controlled or malformed version parameters could be reflected in the version view without proper escaping, enabling XSS. The added system specs that visit a URL with an injected <script> in the version number further confirm this was an XSS issue being fixed.
